text: Stephen Paul Keirn (born September 10, 1951) is an American retired professional wrestler. Since the late 1980s, Keirn has run a school to train wrestlers. Originally located in Tampa, Florida, Keirn's "Professional Wrestling School of Hard Knocks" is now located in Brandon, Florida. title: Steve Keirn
